options.onRender:
// This function runs on every panel refresh
// Time is already handled by the interval in onInit

options.content:
Netscaler Name${instance}
Build${build}
Number of PEs${numpes}
Number of SSL cards${sslcards}
System Custom ID${syscustomid}
Hardware SN${syshardwareserialnumber}
High Availability${syshighavailabilitymode}
Model${sysmodelid}
IP Address${sysipaddress}
Network Mask${sysnetmask}
Gateway${sysgateway}
